name: part_000
file: tmp_【#いろはにコラボ】祝！恋情詩歌リリース記念3Dコラボ配信！ [qgVPqPYGoTU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Splash screen for the "Renjou Shika" release commemoration 3D collaboration featuring Ookami Mio, Nakiri Ayame, and Shirakami Fubuki.
The three VTubers gather in a traditional Japanese room for their intro section and character introductions.

subtitles.original: 恋情詩歌リリース記念！3Dコラボ
subtitles.english: Renjou Shika Release Commemoration! 3D Collaboration

subtitles.original: おーい、始まりましたー！
subtitles.english: Hey, we've started!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: いろはにほへっとあやふみに、恋情詩歌リリース記念3Dコラボ配信、やー！
subtitles.english: Irohanihoheto Ayafumi's "Renjou Shika" Release Commemoration 3D Collaboration Stream, yeah!

subtitles.original: よいしょー！いぇーい！リリース、リリース！
subtitles.english: Yoisho! Yay! Release, release!

subtitles.original: あれ？あれ？
subtitles.english: Wait? Wait?

subtitles.original: どっこいしょ？あれ？
subtitles.english: Dokkoisho? Wait?

subtitles.original: あれ？なんか久しぶりに...
subtitles.english: Wait... it's been a while...

subtitles.original: あれ？ミオちゃん久しぶりじゃない？
subtitles.english: Wait, Mio-chan, hasn't it been a long time?

subtitles.original: お久しぶりに... おかえりだけど、どうした？キャラどうした？キャラ。
subtitles.english: It's been a long time... Welcome back, but what happened to your character?

subtitles.original: なんかいつもと違うな。
subtitles.english: Something's different from usual.

subtitles.original: なんかキャラどうしちゃったの？
subtitles.english: What happened to your character?

subtitles.original: あ、うち、うちだよ、うちうち。大神ミオだよ。
subtitles.english: Ah, it's me, it's me. Uchi-uchi. I'm Ookami Mio.

subtitles.original: あれ？どうした？なんか自信が...
subtitles.english: Huh? What's wrong? You seem to lack confidence...

subtitles.original: どうした？え、余ーだぞ？
subtitles.english: What's wrong? Uh, it's "Yo", you know?

subtitles.original: あれ？ちょっと... この1週間の間にちょっとなんか、ちょっと見失ってきた、自分のこと。
subtitles.english: Huh? Well... over the past week, I've kind of... kind of lost track of who I am.

subtitles.original: 見失わないでよ！
subtitles.english: Don't lose track of yourself!

subtitles.original: 3年半を1週間で！
subtitles.english: Three and a half years gone in one week!

subtitles.original: ちょっと自信ありげに自己紹介してみてよ、じゃあじゃあミオ。思い出して、ちょっと思い出して。
subtitles.english: Try introducing yourself with some confidence then, Mio. Remember, just remember.

subtitles.original: もうちょっと元気あったよ。
subtitles.english: You had a bit more energy before.

subtitles.original: そうだ、そうだった... うー！うちだよ！うちうち！大神ミオだよー！
subtitles.english: That's right, that's how it was... Woo! It's me! Uchi-uchi! I'm Ookami Mio!

subtitles.original: あれ？こんなにぶとかったっけ？
subtitles.english: Wait, was it always that deep?

subtitles.original: おかしいな、もっと可愛かった気が...
subtitles.english: That's weird, I thought it was cuter...

subtitles.original: いぇーいいぇーいいぇーい！いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay yay yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: でも、おかえり！お久しぶりー！
subtitles.english: But, welcome back! Long time no see!

subtitles.original: おかえりなさいませー！
subtitles.english: Welcome back!

subtitles.original: ただいま、だよ！
subtitles.english: I'm back!

subtitles.original: 例の神様...
subtitles.english: That god...

subtitles.original: これ、これこんな感じだったっけ？
subtitles.english: Is this, is this how it was?

subtitles.original: こんな感じだったかなー？
subtitles.english: Was it like this?

subtitles.original: なんかちょっと違う気がしなくもない...
subtitles.english: I feel like something's a bit off...

subtitles.original: 余も3Dの企画久しぶりだから、じゃあ余もやっとくかい？
subtitles.english: It's been a while since "Yo" did a 3D project too, so should "Yo" do it too?

subtitles.original: え？じゃあ、いいですか？どうありましたっけ？なんか。
subtitles.english: Eh? Then, may I? How did it go again? Something like...

subtitles.original: かー！みんなこんなきりー！百鬼あやめです！よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Ka! Konnakiri everyone! I'm Nakiri Ayame! Please treat me well!

subtitles.original: 生百鬼だ！生だ！
subtitles.english: It's a live Nakiri! Live!

subtitles.original: 生百鬼だ！
subtitles.english: Live Nakiri!

subtitles.original: なんかちょっといやらしいんですけど、ちょっと。
subtitles.english: It sounds a bit indecent... Well, it's just a bit...

subtitles.original: どういうことだよ！久しぶりに聞いた「生百鬼」！
subtitles.english: What do you mean! It's been a while since I heard "Live Nakiri"!

subtitles.original: そしてそして！
subtitles.english: And and!

subtitles.original: こんきつねー！白上フブキです！お願いします！
subtitles.english: Kon-kitsune! I'm Shirakami Fubuki! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: 普通じゃねーか！いつも通り来たよ！
subtitles.english: That's just normal! You just came in as usual!

subtitles.original: いつも通りだなー。
subtitles.english: Same as always.

subtitles.original: いつも通りでいいんですよ！
subtitles.english: Normal is fine!

subtitles.original: はい、本日はですね、恋情詩歌のリリースを記念しまして、3D配信です！
subtitles.english: Yes, today we are having a 3D stream to celebrate the release of "Renjou Shika"!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: せっかく3Dで3人が集まられたので、我々にまつわる様々な企画に今回は挑戦していきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: Since the three of us are gathered in 3D, we'd like to challenge ourselves with various projects related to us!

subtitles.original: おー！一体何を...
subtitles.english: Oh! What on earth...

subtitles.original: 何やらですね、罰ゲームもあるということで本日は...
subtitles.english: And it seems there's also a penalty game today...

subtitles.original: え！罰ゲーム！罰ゲームはちょっと勘弁してほしいですねー。
subtitles.english: Eh! A penalty game! I'd really like to be spared from a penalty game.

subtitles.original: やめてー！
subtitles.english: Stop!

subtitles.original: 罰ゲームは大丈夫ですよ、もう。大丈夫ですよ。
subtitles.english: A penalty game is fine, really. It's fine.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫ですよー。
subtitles.english: It's fine.

subtitles.original: いやいやいや。
subtitles.english: No no no.

subtitles.original: えー？なんか自信ありげのようで...
subtitles.english: Eh? You seem so confident...
